results.content: A great course! The key differences you need to be aware of when writing portable code are clearly explained. And the instructor isn't just scratching the surface here; he takes the time to really explain why some APIs behave differently. This turned out be be very valuable when writing my own portable apps. (No more writing ugly hacks to work around the issues!)

response.content: Great that you like the course Niels! No more #ifs for you?
